content: The full Loongscale Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating Kang-Jin Star in Bitter Lake In Turtle Island.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loongscale_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Loongscale Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Loongscale Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating Kang-Jin Star in Bitter Lake In Turtle Island.
